entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
